explanation: Funds are required to be realigned to the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force (RDT&E, AF), 25/26, appropriation from the Aircraft Procurement, Air Force (APAF), 25/27, appropriation for proper execution of the procurement of four Uncrewed Long-Endurance Tactical Reconnaissance Aircraft (ULTRA). These aircraft will support an operational assessment in the research and development phase of the program and therefore are required in the RDT&E, AF account. This is a MIP PROJECT.

Funds are available to be realigned from the Aircraft Procurement, Air Force (APAF), 25/27, appropriation to the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force (RDT&E, AF), 25/26, appropriation for proper execution of the procurement of four Uncrewed Long-Endurance Tactical Reconnaissance Aircraft (ULTRA). These aircraft will support an operational assessment in the research and development phase of the program and therefore are required in the RDT&E, AF account. This is a MIP PROJECT.
